comments:
I20061121-1845

- new workspace
- create Java project with a main class
- switch to Debug perspective, debug the main class
- in Debug view, enable Show Monitors
- export all preferences
- disable Show Monitors
- import all preferences

Moving to platform for comment. When I toggle the preference manually (i.e. via "Show Monitors" action in debug view drop down menu), the value of the property is a Boolean. When I store the preference it is a "boolean". But, on import, it is a String.
See the "Note" class comment on Preferences$IPropertyChangeListener.
In this case you are using the JFace preference API, but it is also specified there (see the "Note" on org.eclipse.jface.preference.IPreferenceStore.addPropertyChangeListener)

Fixed. Found a few places where this was a problem. Changes to:

* JavaElementContentProvider
* ThreadMonitorManager
* JavaThreadEventHandler
* JDIDebugUIPreferenceInitializer
Also fixed ViewerFilterAction to update its toggle (checked) state to refelt its preference after the import.
